titles.title: Expressing support for designation of the month of September as "National Brain Aneurysm Awareness Month".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
9/26/2008--Introduced.
Expresses support for: (1) the designation of National Brain Aneurysm Awareness Month; and (2) research to prevent and treat brain aneurysms.
